title: Against The Ice
writer: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Joe Derrick, Ejnar Mikkelsen
short_cast: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Joe Cole, Heida Reed, Charles Dance, Gísli Örn Garðarsson, Sam Redford, Diarmaid Murtagh, Ed Speleers, Frankie Wilson, Nick Jameson
cast: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Joe Cole, Heida Reed, Charles Dance, Gísli Örn Garðarsson, Sam Redford, Diarmaid Murtagh, Ed Speleers, Frankie Wilson, Nick Jameson
genre: Danish, Movies Based on Real Life, Period Pieces, Movies Based on Books, Action & Adventure, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Exploring Greenland's vast landscape for a lost map, two men must fight to survive. Based on the true story of Denmark's 1909 polar expedition.
